'''Gaston''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[The Palace of Alcazarzaray]], [[Sumeru]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player four [[Adventurer's Experience]].

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Gaston.png|Gaston's location
NPC Location Gaston Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
==Profile==
He is a reporter of [[The Steambird]] currently at [[The Palace of Alcazarzaray]] hoping to interview it's owner.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Gaston:''' I must ask these questions once that "Lord" of theirs returns...
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing?
::'''Gaston:''' I traveled all the way here from [[Fontaine]] just to interview the owner of this place.
::'''Gaston:''' I inquired about it everywhere, while people are constantly praising [[Kaveh|the architect]] who designed this place, no one knows who owns it.
::'''Gaston:''' Isn't that an obvious scoop for me!?
::'''Gaston:''' I may be just be a trainee reporter from [[The Steambird]], but I can't let that stop me. If I want to write an intriguing article, then I must be the first to eat the Specter!
::'''Gaston:''' So no matter how hard it is, I'm going to meet the owner of this place!
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Persistence is the key!
:::'''Gaston:''' You're right!
:::'''Gaston:''' That's what my teacher taught me: A journalist needs to have an adventurous spirit to make my news report the biggest blast!
::;(Obtain {{Item|Adventurer's Experience|x=4}})
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Gaston:''' You're leaving already? Bye then. I'll be waiting a while longer.
{{Dialogue End}}
